content:
The Additional results may be available if you add a stream: or streams operator to your search. Learn more. text box placement looks a little unclean in my opinion. The layout in general looks a little weird.

Screenshot_4.png
I think this is mostly because of the b/w Zulip logo that we have above the text. We could consider moving that logo as a possible solution
Or maybe center the Additional results... text, to match how everything else is centered in that view?
@Vinit Singh agreed, we should do something to make that UI look nicer.
Possibly the right answer is to not show the Z thing at all in searches like this with no results.
Yeah, removing the Z would be a good idea. We could also try a combination of the two and see how that looks. I'll try to push a PR for this asap.

There's also I think a more important bug that I noticed and we should open an issue for, which is that we display that notice briefly in cases where there are messages that we're about to fetch from the server.
Is the original intention that the text is supposed to only be visible if there are no search results?
@Yash RE no, it should also appear at the very top of search results if you've scrolled all the way there.
Just not if you have only partial results because more are being loaded from the server.
